description: REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION: RECOMMENDED that Defendants'  71  motion for summary judgment be GRANTED IN PART AND DENIED IN PART; RECOMMENDED that Plaintiff's claims against all Defendants in their official capacities, Plaintiff's penden t state law claims, and Plaintiff's claims against Defendants Ryan, Riley, and Perrea be dismissed; RECOMMENDED that Plaintiff's actions against all other Defendants in their individual capacities proceed to trial; RECOMMENDED that all clai ms against Defendant Darcy Curnell be dismissed without prejudice pursuant to Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 4(m); ORDERED that the clerk serve copies of the unpublished cases cited on pages 26 and 27of this Report-Recommendation on Plaintiff. Objections to R&R due by 4/7/2009 Case Review Deadline 4/13/2009.  Signed by Magistrate Judge George H.
